                  format   = 'edgelist',
                  directed = FALSE),
  ir = read_graph('networks/internet_routers.txt',

                  format   = 'edgelist',
                  directed = FALSE)
)
# Pre-calculate diameters of graphs, via igraph, Gephi, etc,
# since initializing a station_graph requires this,
# and it is computationally expensive
diams <- list(pg = 46,
              ir = 11,
              cr = 849)
